Started well over a century ago, Merkur came from the same world-renown steel production center as Dovo did: Solingen, Germany.

For decades, the two premium men’s razor manufacturers vied for top spot in their markets until the day came when Dovo extended an olive branch and bought out Merkur.

While Merkur is now an extension of Dovo, the commitment to quality remains. Men who prefer to wet shave can still enjoy the same quality in Merkur’s double-edge safety razors.

When men buy Merkur’s products these are some of the additional products they tend to buy: Colonel Conk Glycerin Soap, Captain Fawcett’s Best Badger Shaving Brush, Omega  and Niegeloh Chrome Nail Clippers.

Want to find out how to best market this legendary brand of razors to your customers? We’d be happy to help. Our team of seasoned sales people know these products inside and out and will train you and your staff on the best ways to curate these items.
